price: (12) He invokes instead of Allāh that which neither harms him nor benefits him. That is what is the extreme error.
arabic: يَدۡعُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَضُرُّهُۥ وَمَا لَا يَنفَعُهُۥۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلضَّلَٰلُ ٱلۡبَعِيدُ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yadʿū min dūni al-lahi mā lā yaḍurruhu wamā lā yanfaʿuhu dhālika huwa al-ḍalālu al-baʿīdu
